1. UI Kit
  2. Progress Bars

Progress bar can be created with simply one line of html code shown below:

<progressbar value="40"></progressbar>

You can style the progress bars with different colors and sizes with type attribute and different size classes. Supported sizes are progress-xxs, progress-xs and progress-sm

Colors
Sizes
Variations
45% {{bar.value}}%

Progress bar can be of different variations also with optional label to show progress rate.

Also you can display stacked progress bars with list of <bar> elements inside a<progress> element.
